content.content: Sarah had tried everything. Keto, intermittent fasting, Weight Watchers, personal trainers, meal delivery services. At 48, despite eating 1200 calories daily and exercising 6 days a week, she couldn't lose a single pound—and was actually gaining 2-3 pounds monthly.

Sound familiar? New research published in Cell Metabolism reveals why traditional weight loss approaches fail spectacularly for women over 45—and introduces a revolutionary metabolic reset protocol that's helping women like Sarah finally break free from stubborn weight gain.
